page.title: 07HOUSING IN TODDINGTON 2
page.content: { BUILDING MATERIALS AND SERVICES {-------------------------------- The main building material is brick as there is no local stone available. Extensive use has been made of cladding and rendering. Roofing is mainly tile but in parts the original thatch and slate remain. All the main services are available, although some properties still are not connected to the main sewage system. {HOUSE PRICES {------------- Because Toddington is a popular place to live there are very few uninhabited houses and few houses for sale.The average price of a houses in Toddington is around Â£90,000 for a detached house, Â£45,000 for a semi-detached house and Â£30,000 for a terraced cottage. These prices are slightly higher than in nearby towns.
